questions.question: What is the solution to x² - 5x + 6 = 0?
questions.explanation: Factoring gives (x-2)(x-3) = 0, so x = 2 or x = 3.

questions.question: The quadratic formula can solve any quadratic equation.
questions.explanation: The quadratic formula x = (-b ± √(b²-4ac)) / 2a works for all quadratic equations.

questions.question: What is the degree of the polynomial 3x⁴ + 2x² - 5?
questions.explanation: The degree of a polynomial is the highest power of the variable, which is 4 in this case.
